contexts.context: ...of adventure and danger and freedom, but if <mark>you'd</mark> only take one moment to think of me, stuck...
...here all by myself, worrying about you. I suppose <mark>you'd</mark> like it if I took more of an interest...
"S'Riizh watches though," said S'Riizh. <mark>"You'd</mark> be surprised how much you can learn just by...
"Why don't you explain specifically what <mark>you'd</mark> like us to do?" asked Galsiah calmly, trying...
